intro: Psychotria ebensis, commonly known as the West African Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly found in countries like Nigeria and Ghana. The plant is characterized by its small, simple leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically red when mature. Psychotria ebensis is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
